duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform work in the Receiving area of the store which includes merchandise stocking, inventory control, pricing, and merchandise returns.
Support a strong commitment to world-class customer service and ensure a pleasant and productive shopping experience for all customers.
Unloads trucks, stocks merchandise, tickets merchandise, and processes returns.
Maintains Receiving area layout as set by the Corporate Office.
Interact with other associates in a friendly, positive, and professional manner.
Keep work area clean, neat, and safe.
Follow all Company Policies and Procedures.
Perform all other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent experience
